function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Consumer engagement in maladaptive behaviors in response to the coronavirus pandemic.","Impact":"Negative impact on public health, market stability, and social harmony.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted strategies for each consumer segment to mitigate the damaging impact of maladaptive behaviors.","Technologies":"Data analytics for consumer segmentation, targeted marketing strategies, and public health communication tools.","People":"Consumers, businesses, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities, and businesses."}]}
